description: Russia's president scorns a report alleging that agents poisoned opposition leader Alexei Navalny.
title: Russia's Putin calls Navalny poisoning inquiry 'a trick'
title_page: Russia's Putin calls Navalny poisoning inquiry 'a trick' - BBC News
maintext: He said the pandemic had created "a sea of problems" for Russia. But there had been worse times, he stressed, noting that in 2000 about one in three Russians was below the official poverty level. Now, he said, the figure was 13.5% - about 20m people - and the goal was to lower it to 6.5% by 2030.
